column4: how do I create a launcher to launch multiple commands? if I do "command1 && command2" it doesn't do anything
the syntax is fine because it works in a terminal
it's not a terminal. it's a gnome launcher
you may need 'yourterminal -e (your commands) amd you may require a second terminal -e 2ndcommand'
it works if i have one command, but not two
this is what i'm putting for 2 commands: gnome-terminal -e "notify-send \"Keyboard layout changed to English\" \&\& setxkbmap us"
i also tried it without escaping the &'s
ok i got it. i had to do sh -c
try gnome-terminal -e "notify-send 'Keyboard layout changed to English' && gnome-terminal -e 'setxkbmap us'
meh, you got it in the end :)
your welcome, glad i could help a little :)
